trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity"></xref> class encapsulates the transport security settings for the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel.
The Message Queuing integration channel enables [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] applications to communicate with existing Message Queuing applications.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref> that is associated with the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel.

<xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode> is an enumeration that contains the following values: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode.None> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode.Transport>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode"></xref> that is associated with the Message Queuing integration channel.
Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> that is associated with the Message Queuing (MSMQ) integration channel.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity> encapsulates the security settings for the Message Queuing integration transport.
The settings are the same for both the Message Queuing integration and queued transports.
<xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity> enables you to set the Authentication Mode, Encryption Algorithm, Secure Hash Algorithm, and Protection Level.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity"></xref> that is associated with the Message Queuing integration channel.
